content.en: Nonuniformity correction: Researchers have developed various algorithms to address the issue of nonuniformity noise in focal-plane arrays. These algorithms aim to compensate for spatial fixed-pattern noise, bias nonuniformity, and other forms of nonuniformity in infrared sensors. The algorithms use scene-based approaches, statistical recursive filtering, interframe registration, and other techniques to improve the nonuniformity correction and mitigate artifacts in infrared imaging systems.
content.da: Ikke-ensartethedskorrektion: Forskere har udviklet forskellige algoritmer for at håndtere problemet med ikke-ensartet støj i fokalplanearrangementer. Disse algoritmer har til formål at kompensere for rumlige faste mønsterstøj, bias-ikke-ensartethed og andre former for ikke-ensartethed i infrarøde sensorer. Algoritmerne bruger scenebaserede tilgange, statistisk rekursiv filtrering, interframe-registrering og andre teknikker for at forbedre ikke-ensartethedskorrektionen og afbøde artefakter i infrarøde billeddannelsessystemer.
